name: tgval3
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cab(s0, wex(s1, wa(wss(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cuni(cv(s1))))))))

stmt.pretty: abbi2dv(s0, (topGen ` c0), c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1,(s1 ⊆ c0 ∧ s0 = ⋃ s1)))

comment: Alternate expression for the topology generated by a basis. Lemma 2.1 of [Munkres] p. 80. See also ~ tgval and ~ tgval2 . (Contributed by NM, 17-Jul-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
